title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Competencies: Utilizing Open Educational Resources for Anti-Racist Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can identify and analyze at least three OER materials applying anti-racist education principles to mathematics instruction
Learners can create lesson designs that reduce cultural bias within mathematics curricula using open pedagogy techniques
Learners can share practical examples of improving anti-racist mathematics education strategies based on peer feedback
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
